title: Yamato Takeru
synopsis: In the 25th century, a spaceship carrying 300 people leaves the earth in search of a new world in the solar system, but an unexpected accident occurs. They crash into a black hole which is connected to another universe. The people on the ship are cast adrift in an emergency capsule to a planet called Ismo. The story begins 12 years after they have reached Ismo.
voices: ['Kanai, Mika', 'Kamei, Yoshiko', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Ogata, Megumi', 'Takagi, Wataru', 'Orikasa, Ai', 'Ishida, Akira']
staff: [['Iuchi, Shuji', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Series Composition']], ['Yamamoto, Yuusuke', ['Episode Director']], ['Masaki, Shinichi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Fujimoto, Yoshitaka', ['Episode Director']]]
